roleset.name: having a one track mind
roleset.note: SINGLEMINDED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from singleminded.01-j)

role.descr: entity with a one track mind

example.name: arg1, concatenated rel
example.text: Although we could n't say they are as solid as one single iron plate , they are very stable and single - minded . For the record , American imperialists have absolutely no guts to invade such an opponent .
